lead_paragraph: After dismal performances in two opening losses, the Charlotte Hornets knew they needed to regroup quickly in their first-round Eastern Conference playoff series against the Miami Heat.

headline.print_headline: Hornets Break Through While Cooling Off Heat
headline.main: Hornets Break Through While Cooling Off Heat
